title: Repair the Flooded Mine
description: A group of engineers work to drain the flooded mine, shore up its damaged section, and establish the mine as a functional Work Site. @lose20ResourcePoints, then attempt a DC 32 Engineering check.

criticalSuccess.msg: The mine is repaired, and as a bonus, your workers Establish a Work Site at the mine immediately. This mine produces 2 Ore Commodities per Kingdom turn.

success.msg: The mine is repaired. This mine produces 2 Ore Commodities per Kingdom turn.

failure.msg: Work on repairing the mine proceeds, but at a much slower (and more expensive) pace than you’d hoped. The mine remains flooded, but you can attempt this check again on the next Kingdom turn.

criticalFailure.msg: Work on repairing the mine proceeds, but at a much slower (and more expensive) pace than you’d hoped. The mine remains flooded, but you can attempt this check again on the next Kingdom turn. In addition, a catastrophic failure costs the lives of several workers. @gain2Unrest and @gain1Decay. The next time you attempt to Repair the Flooded Mine, it costs 40 RP.
